about.title: About Ovrkode
about.paragraph1: We are two passionate developers based in Montreal. With experience in React, Symfony, SQL, and web design, we offer professional solutions tailored to small businesses and entrepreneurs.
about.paragraph2: Our mission: to deliver a fast, beautiful, and easy-to-manage website. We focus on quality, transparency, and efficiency.
